body_content.explanation: abbreviation for ultra low emission zone: an area of a city that you must pay to enter if you are driving a vehicle that produces more than a very low level of harmful emissions (= waste gases):
examples: Private hire vehicles, like other cars, will have to meet the emissions standards to enter the ULEZ without paying.
Vehicles need to meet the ULEZ emissions standards or their drivers must pay a daily charge to drive within the zone.
